cyclone.name: DELTA
cyclone.current_location: about 425 miles south of Cameron, Louisiana
cyclone.trajectory: Moving northwest across the central Gulf, expected to turn north then north-northeast toward the southwest Louisiana coast

weather_observation.watch_coast: High Island, TX to Sabine Pass
weather_observation.warning_coast: San Luis Pass, TX to Sabine Pass
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Sabine Pass TX eastward to Morgan City LA and adjoining coasts
weather_observation.wind: Tropical storm–force winds (40–60 mph) likely Friday, with a 36 % chance of 50-kt (58 mph) sustained winds; brief hurricane-force gusts cannot be ruled out.
weather_observation.storm_surge: 2–4 ft of surge possible in Sabine Lake and adjacent coast (Storm Surge Watch).
weather_observation.rainfall: 3–6 inches with isolated amounts up to 10 inches possible, producing flash and urban flooding.
weather_observation.other_hazards: High surf, dangerous rip currents, minor coastal flooding, and a low risk of isolated tornadoes on Friday.
